captions.text:
Plan and Production by
SBS contents hub

What is it like to 
 grow old together

I want to grow old
with her together

Love from the star Part.6
Huk Gak- Tears fallin' like today

The person who was calling
You out was me

Tears fallin' like today
Is my love

You were always beside me
But I didn't know it was you

Why do I hug you and say
Sad things when you've been waiting
I keep looking back
And I keep regretting
Having daily life together

Going back home where
someone is waiting

Expressing true feelings about
 how you love the other person
Those things

I laughed at those things
because human do it when they
Can live barely to a hundred

Those small and warm
beautiful daily things
Now I came to want it
What do I do?

How much tears fallin' like
Today is left

I don't know love and breakups
Tell me

It becomes raindrops and 
Blurs my eyes

Where are you about 
More tears' fallin' like today

How much, I don't know
How much, I don't know

More tears' fallin' like today
How much, I don't know
How much, I don't know

Love from the star Part.6
Huk Gak - Tears fallin' like today

comments.text:
이렇게 널 부르던 그 사람 나라는걸 
눈치 없이 흐르는 내 눈물 사랑인걸 

늘 내 옆에 있었는데 너인줄 모르고 
왜 기다린 널 안고 슬픈 얘기만 말해 

오늘 같은 눈물이 더 얼마나 남아있나 
사랑을 또 이별을 난 몰라 말해줄래 
자꾸만 빗물이 눈물되어 내 앞을 가리고 
어디쯤 가고 있나 오늘 같은 눈물이 더 

얼마나 더 난 몰라 
얼마나 더 난 몰라 

눈물 없는 사랑은 사랑이 아니란걸 
이제서야 알았어 이별도 사랑인걸 

널 두고서 떠나야해 널 두고 가야해 
왜 오늘을 알면서 사랑한다고 말해 

오늘 같은 눈물이 더 얼마나 남아있나 
사랑을 또 이별을 난 몰라 말해줄래 
자꾸만 빗물이 눈물되어 내 앞을 가리고 
어디쯤 가고 있나 오늘 같은 눈물이 더 

얼마나 더 난 몰라 
얼마나 더 난 몰라 
오늘 같은 눈물이 
난 몰라 
얼마나 더 난 몰라﻿

comments.text:
I CAN'T TAKE THIS DRAMA ANYMORE TT_TT it's so fuckingly messing with my 
feelings. I can't. Seriously!
I can't take all these beautiful OSTs.
I can't take Kim Soo Hyun's heart-breaking tears/crying.
I can't take all these warm romantic moments.
I can't take Jun Ji Hyun's flawless awesome acting.
I can't take all the precious characters.
I can't take all the kisses and skin-ships.
I can't take the depressing yet amazing story line.
I can't take such a sexy alien.
F*CK.﻿

comments.author: TheSLove26

comments.text: Watch more tvn dramas such as the reply series.
comments.author: Tara Doherty

comments.text:
well even though heirs is addressed to younger audience I thought the cast 
was really good and the kiss scenes were quite good compared to other teen 
dramas like "my girlfriend is a gumiho" or "shinning inheritance" even 
better than adult dramas like the recent "the prime minister and I" or 
"master's sun" where kiss scenes are just awful. We just have to take into 
account that in the Korean society, public affection is not really common 
like in western countries and most of the celebs have relationship 
restrictions so it's normal that the romantic or passional scenes from the 
dramas are quite influenced by this fact. BUT in some cases I prefer the 
way they act than the kisses as they transmit more than some of the western 
tv actors/actresses
comments.author: kristy's beauty budget

comments.text:
you don't rly see "evolution", dramas like heirs have just bad production 
and are probably targeted towards younger audience. dramas like this (which 
have melodramatic parts) are targeted to more mature audience, thus showing 
better kisses. the best kiss of all time is in potato star (recommend it) :D
